column5: Located in the Historic District is one of Fredericksburg Texasâ€™ most beautiful properties, The Bierschwale Estate. Designed by the noted English architect, Alfred Giles, this private home was built in 1889. Nestled on the grounds is a fabulous cottage with a beautiful bathroom with walk in shower and a beautiful bedroom with a queen size bed. The grounds are beautifully landscaped with numerous areas to relax. This is the perfect place to escape to.
